data.event: The population of the 2000 Rural Subdivision blocks exceeds that of the town itself.

event.title: 14 March 2011 a blockade against coal seam gas development began

data.event: On 14 March 2011 a blockade against coal seam gas development began at a property called Kenya near Tara.

event.title: The following day a woman was arrested

data.event: The following day a woman was arrested after she stopped the movement of a bulldozer working for Queensland Gas Company.

event.title: The next month Bob Irwin was arrested and fined

data.event: The next month Bob Irwin was arrested and fined for participating in a rally at the same location.
